mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.ass_id AS "assId", a.line_no AS "lineNo", a.address AS "address", a.new_remarks AS "newRemarks", a.file_name AS "fileName", a.file_type AS "fileType"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO co_attachments( id, proc_ins_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, ass_id, line_no, address, new_remarks, file_name, file_type ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{procInsId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{assId}, #{lineNo}, #{address}, #{newRemarks}, #{fileName}, #{fileType} )
mapper.update: UPDATE co_attachments SET proc_ins_id = #{procInsId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, ass_id = #{assId}, line_no = #{lineNo}, address = #{address}, new_remarks = #{newRemarks}, file_name = #{fileName}, file_type = #{fileType} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
